actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4171 of the Revised Statues to allow the endorsement on certificates of registry of alternate masters.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to endorse not more than two alternate masters in addition to the one already endorsed on the certificate of registry of a vessel not exceeding 100 gross tons employed in carrying fishing parties or other passengers on pleasure excursions.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4171 of the Revised Statues to allow the endorsement on certificates of registry of alternate masters.
